pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MQTT HASS BASESmall python lib to create quickly daemons which interact with HomeAssistant through MQTT.[![Latest Release](https://gitlab.com/ttblt-hass/mqtt-hass-base/-/badges/release.svg)](https://gitlab.com/ttblt-hass/mqtt-hass-base/-/releases)[![pipeline status](https://gitlab.com/ttblt-hass/mqtt-hass-base/badges/master/pipeline.svg)](https://gitlab.com/ttblt-hass/mqtt-hass-base/-/commits/master)[![coverage report](https://gitlab.com/ttblt-hass/mqtt-hass-base/badges/master/coverage.svg)](https://gitlab.com/ttblt-hass/mqtt-hass-base/-/commits/master)## Documentation**TODO**
